qas.question: How large is Punjab compared to the other three provinces?
How many square miles is Punjab?
What Indian states are on the east side of Punjab, Pakistan?
What Pakistani province is south of Punjab?
What borders Balochistan to the northeast?

plausible_answers.text: the Indian states of Punjab and Rajasthan

qas.question: Where does Islamabad rank in terms of province size in Pakistan?

context: Punjab is Pakistan's <a0_0><b9_0>second<b9_0/> largest<a0_0/> province in terms of land area at <b5_0>205,344 km2 (<a2_0>79,284<a2_0/> sq mi)<b5_0/>, after <a1_0>Balochistan<a1_0/>, and is located at the north western edge of the geologic Indian plate in South Asia. The province is bordered by <b6_0>Kashmir<b6_0/> (Azad Kashmir, Pakistan and Jammu and Kashmir, India) to the northeast, <b7_0>the Indian states of <a3_0>Punjab and Rajasthan<b7_0/><a3_0/> to the east, the Pakistani province of <a4_0>Sindh<a4_0/> to the south, the province of Balochistan to the southwest, the province of <b8_0>Khyber Pakhtunkhwa<b8_0/> to the west, and the Islamabad Capital Territory to the north.
